entries.title: Stephen Colbert to Guest Star as Late-Night Host on CBS Crime Comedy ‘Elsbeth’
entries.content: Stephen Colbert is taking his hosting skills to another CBS property. The “Late Show” helmsman will guest star in an upcoming episode of the crime comedy series “Elsbeth,” appearing as a late-night frontman, Variety has confirmed. A CBS rep declined Variety‘s request fo...
